name: Yesica Castellanos
text: Love this place its like my second home. Super stellar customer service and speedy delivery/ pickup. Defiantly my top place to go. Keep up the excellent job

name: Arwyn Kazarine
text: I ordered delivery and I must say it is far better than any, Hungry Howies that I‚Äôve tried on the east coast. The food was hot, fresh and delivered in a timely manner. üçïüëç

name: Juan Taylor
text: Would surely recommend visiting this place. Great character, flavorful dishes, great service. Highly recommended.

name: Gautam Atri Valley Realtor
text: This is a Place with some delicious pizzas and stuffed breads. I highly recommend that you try it. I promise you won't be disappointed. The staff is wonderful, clean and polite. It's impressive

name: Le Family
text: Good pizza. Excellent service! I ordered pizza on the 4th of July. I ordered online and somehow ordered a pepperoni pizza with no cheese üòï. Instead of just making it because they were busy, they took the time to call to verify my order since it didn't seem right. I will definitely order from them again!

name: William Spain Upkeep
text: A fun place to get pizza from, stands out from the mainstream pizzas and the flavors are a whole lot better

name: lisa callo
text: I always order from there and can not complain. They have great!! customer service and there pizza is amazing! It is always hot and fresh we dont order pizza from anywhere else anymore. üëç

name: Esteban Ocampo
text: BEST PIZZA IN TOWN!  Like i said in the past, try Butter Cheese Ranch crust on a Largeü§§ü§§

name: bonsaibrian
text: OG Clovis Pizza.  Had the same phone number for over 25 years...that says it roght there.  Baller pizza, good, affordable, and that flavored crust.  Eat it. A lot.  Much love Howie!!!

name: Pam Williams
text: For the first time ever I did not like my Hungry Howie's Pizza they gave me the wrong order I asked for butter parmesan crust which is the best and they gave me regular crust and made a total difference we had two large pizzas and we only ‚Ä¶More

name: Brenda Soares
text: I really liked my service the guy was very polite,he recommended I get the special it was a better price and carried my order out to my car when others ready. Oh my order was done in like 8 minutes. Pizza and cheesy bread were great. Try their Cancun sauce nice kick.

name: Melissa Fairless
text: When I called they didnt ask me about what flavor crust I would like. So  I forgot to order the one I wanted. The guy was rushing me when I had questions!  The heart shaped pizzas were a joke for the price the picture in ad was misleading in size!

name: Matthew DeBellis
text: I promised some friends that I would pick up food, and although i put in a pretty large order the two gentlemen got to work instantly and had me out of there several minutes before I planned on. The food was delicious and everyone was very ‚Ä¶More

name: Jeff Oakley
text: Pizza arrived slid to the side.  As if it were dropped.

name: Marisa Alvarez
text: Super rude! As I placed my order over the phone the man cussed to hurry the F up thinking I couldn't hear then when I picked up my order I had my husband's debit card to use for payment and because it was my husband's card obviously I knew ‚Ä¶More

name: Annie Smith
text: Order was ready quickly, at a good price, delicious food with amazing crust flavors, and the service was friendly.

name: Mark Gibson
text: VERY PLEASED when I first picked up the pizza box I was like what the heck is there bricks in this box seriously it was very heavy so on the way out to the parking lot I dropped my ranch dressing they had given me for my wings they had ‚Ä¶More

name: Mlke Tucek
text: The staff could be a little friendlier, the pizza is good, have not tried any of the many other choices on there menu.

name: Terry Moreno
text: Reasonable price and good

name: raul j. samarripa
text: Love this place we order from here when we feel like having excellent pizza which is all the time thank you guys for being top notch pizza for us

name: Sierra c
text: Chill people and pizza is always good & made in reasonable time

name: Joshua Castro
text: Good food. Staff lacks good customer service skills. Price is good.

name: Florencio Villicana
text: Good pizza  good prices

name: Brianna Leonard
text: Great pizza, great prices!

name: Angel S
text: The dough is made fresh daily, the freshest topping ingredients and a variety of buttery and/or flavored crusts. OMG...piping hot, fresh delicious pizza. A must try one of a kind pizza experience.

name: Jason Brown
text: We went and got two pizzas and bread sticks for $15. The employees were nice and patient (it being our first time there) the food was inexpensive and had a unique twist. Everything was delicious, but I wish they offered white sauce on their pizzas.

name: Brian Blalack
text: Great pizza. Love the app and rewards program.

name: Jessie Valdez
text: They were friendly. I went in during closing time and they were happy to make everything we asked for. The pizza was great and the cheese bread was delicious.

name: Kevin Ackerman
text: Prices are high, and when the food did get here the pizza was stuck to the top of the box and the cinnamon sticks were half burnt and had almost no topping on them, The Howie rolls are ok at best and do not include pizza sauce like the ‚Ä¶More

name: Antoinette Moore
text: Do not patronize this place if you hate racial prejudice.

name: Abbas Bazzy
text: Love the pizza here.  I've tried a lot different pizza joints and this one is the best value for quality and price.  Can't beat the sesame crust.

name: Andrew Barwick
text: Best pizza I have found for eating out!

name: C Sa
text: This place sucks. They don't clean. Pizzas are cooked on dirty pans. Tastes like cardboard.

name: Jared Erlewine
text: Lately everytime I order the pizza gets worse and worse. I‚Äôll order butter cheese crust. And they don‚Äôt put anything on the crust. And tonight the delivery man tried to charge us an extra $3 saint it was 23.54. I checked the reciept and it said 20.54. I don‚Äôt recommend this hungry howies anymore

name: Ramon Gonzalez
text: Love the pizza. All meat is the best.

name: Reign Solari
text: Really terrible phone service. Employee was disinterested, and bothered. His demeanor made me uncomfortable, I am considering canceling my order and never calling here again. The worst service ive experinced.

name: Duane Deister
text: I won't be back. they charged me an extra 2 blocks for artichoke hearts. okay I thought fine . but the amount they put on was so small it was like $0.05 worth of artichoke hearts. totally disappointing. So Hungry Howies in Clovis you will not see me again.

name: Eva Soliz
text: I've always had a good experience with the employees. I love that they use 100% mozzarella, can def. tell the difference

name: Anthony Shanx
text: When yourenin the mood to spend ten bucks and don't want to go too far to get good pizza or have it delivered. This is your place.

name: Jess Palm
text: Never had a bad experience here and my food is always ready on time. I get it at least once a month, the coupons are great when you get them too!

name: alee
text: I love how they make my pizza. Their sauce is so good. However there is a terribly rude girl that works there but as soon as she's gone I'll give you that star she lost you.

name: Justin Peckham
text: Ok pizza. Nothing special though as there is cheaper and better tasting pizza.

name: S N
text: Handles online orders through the phone app excellent. Pizza is good for the price more often than not.

name: Mando Getscheddar
text: Hard to beat for the price

name: jennii anderson
text: it was even more delicious than ii remember!!!

name: James Symens
text: Quick, cheap,  & tasty

name: Geraldine Gardenhire
text: I like their food. Price is good.

name: CenCalMarine YBert
text: Love me some cheap pizza

name: Gary Gluntz
text: Very good variety of pizza and at a fair price.

name: Dustin Shaw
text: Great food ,good job.

name: Barbara Starkey
text: Nice guys, good pizza!!!

name: Ryan Albee
text: Has literally some of the best crust for a pizza you can get, but it comes at a cost. The pizza can be kinda pricy, even for just a pepperoni

name: Jacob 777
text: My favorite pizza place by far!

name: Maria Bautista

text: Its basically a dominoes. Not bad, priced right & the food was ready fast.

name: cowboys #1 lorenzg
text: Best pizza in clovis delivery was fast and my pizza was nice and hot love all the flavored crusts and the staff is very friendly cant beat the good deals too

text: The service was very rude and in professional   Tyler was the person taking my order.  Why advertise delivery service if you don't or won't deliver .
